title: Catholicgauze's Atlas
name: Catholicgauze's Atlas
description:
A Map by Catholicgauze

This atlas marks locations that have been dicussed on the blog &quot;Geographic Travels with Catholicgauze!&quot;  The blog can be found here http://catholicgauze.blogspot.com

properties.name: Half of Chinese Do Not Know Chinese
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeIf language is the common bound of a national culture; then China has a problem

properties.name: AAG in Chicago
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeIt was a simple plan: Several geographers going to the 102nd Association of American Geographers convention in Chicago. It ended with us hoping for zombies to kill us. It was that bad. Part 1: http://catholicgauze.blogspot.com/2006/03/bush-league.html Part 2: http://catholicgauze.blogspot.com/2006/03/bush-league-part-2.html Part 3: http://catholicgauze.blogspot.com/2006/03/bush-league-part-3.html
